summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of May 2015. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers to other financial entities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in this document, with significant transactions occurring during May 2015.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to JP Morgan
events.description: A transfer of $150,000.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to JP Morgan.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Bank Forwarding
events.description: A transfer of $63,647.67 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to an entity named 'Cherrington Enterprises, Inc.'

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's Deutsche Bank account for May 2015.
The beginning balance on May 1, 2015, was $467,322.60.
Two significant outgoing transfers were made: $150,000 to JP Morgan on May 11, 2015, and $63,647.67 to Cherrington Enterprises, Inc. on May 26, 2015.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2015, was $253,674.93.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
